task.name: TalkingToProf
task.description: Talk to your Professor to get information about your first assignment.

task.name: GoToDorm
task.description: Find your RA in the dorms.

task.name: TalkingToRA
task.description: Talk to your RA for assistance on your paper.

task.name: GoToLB
task.description: Go to the Library basement entrance on the south wall of the Library.

task.name: TalkToALPHA
task.description: Talk to the weird blue thing.

task.name: TalkToALPHA
task.description: Talk to ALPHA to get more information about the time period.

task.name: GoToLab
task.description: Find Rosalind Franklin in her Lab which is located on the northern side of campus.

task.name: TalkingToRF
task.description: Talk to Rosalind Franklin about her research.

task.name: TalkToLabAsst
task.description: Talk to the Lab assistant to get the x-rays.

task.name: ReturnXRAY
task.description: Return the X-rays to Rosalind Franklin.

task.name: TalkToALPHA2
task.description: Talk to ALPHA to leave this time period.
